Text: How do i install the antares plugins?

There are many .rar files. Do I have to unpack all of them?  

It showed that Vocalign was only a trial version.  Im wondering if this was because i didn't unpack all the files?

Please help.  Thanks

When I install Vocalign it says trial when protools starts up and asks me whether or not I wish to start the 14 day trial or buy or quit, those are the only options, in the nfo it says something about locating cracks in the xvx folder, where is that? I do not see it anywhere, I don't want a bunch of trials running on my computer. Please get back to me. Thanks!
Nevermind, pretty sure I figured it out! Thanks!
Nevermind, nope it still says trial... Not sure what the problem is here...
